Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii

::Grimlock::
 
In the course of the fighting Grimlock manages to look up and catch the incoming Minion Sweeps and their missiles.
 
Grimlock points up trying to point this out to Lord Perseus.
 
Grimlock: Me Grimlock think we see replay of Atlantis fight!

--- On Wed, 6/11/08, supercyclonus <supercyclonus@...> wrote:

From: supercyclonus <supercyclonus@...>
Subject: Minions over the Black Fortress
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Date: Wednesday, June 11, 2008, 4:50 PM






As the battle of Autobot vs Decepticon, Maximal vs Predicon continued 
to rage near the black Fortress - high over ahead, the same clouds 
that originally disgorged Megatron continued to roll and twist as 
dark winds thrust through them, ripping at them like some unseen 
claws.

In eerie silence small motes of inky blackness seemed to appear from 
out of the broiling clouds. First only a few sprinkled amidst the 
skies like soot, but then all too quickly they grew in both number 
and size!

Then two bright lights seemed to streak from the group, like shooting 
stars bursting from amidst the clouds. As they passed through the 
group the motes of black are briefly lit, revealing the distinctive 
oblong shape of Scourge's hunters, trackers and killers! Many 
centuries from today humans will dare to call them soap-dishes with 
cannons, but today they have arrived and are intent upon destruction!

As the twin lights pass out into the open skies they only become 
brighter and more powerful as their pod like shapes reveal their true 
character: MISSILES!! Like twin suns they streak forward, directing 
their destructive power down upon Hydras' base, even as the rest of 
the approaching host continues inexorably onward!

The Minions have arrived!!!!

 














      
--0-1490484478-1213227086=:6580
